feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
